card.title: Attendance at the National Assembly sessions

info.lead: Parliamentary groups's attendance at the National Assembly sessions compared to average and maximum value.
info.text: For each session and for each parliamentary group we count the number of MPs who voted or spoken at least once per session. When all sessions are added together we divide the result by the number of all sessions times the number of MPs in the parliamentary group. The result is then normalised (min 1 - max 100).
